name: The Abnormality
description:
As my final assignment for my studies we had 6 weeks to create a specialization task. I chose to create a first person shooter that focus on the atmospheric scene as well as the ominous sense of an abandoned town. 

There are still quite a few bugs and tweaks that need to be made in the game over time but this is a highly polished slice of a potential game that could be developed further. The enemies in the game do not have proper models yet and are currently just target dummies but over time I will add proper enemies to the game as well as fix certain bugs in the game that I discovered at my University showcase.

DISCLAIMER: * Assets and sound used are not my own. They are free from the unity asset store as well as from free sound effect websites such as MixKit and PixaBay. *
